entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
